Tina Huang - UX Designer at Rakuten Viki

Tina Huang is a UX designer with a background in mathematics. Whenever trying to solve complex problems, she seeks for solutions that impact the outcomes in various forms through designing with empathy and by being data-informed. She endeavours into simple, intuitive solutions that can improve the lives around her.
